title: Best laptops under $500 in 2023: Best overall, best OLED laptop, and more
description:
As much as we all might want to buy the most powerful laptop around, it’s not always feasible on a budget. When it comes to sub-$500 laptops, it’s especially important to be smart about your choices. Realistically, you’ll need to make some compromises, but it’s entirely possible to get a great laptop with reliable performance on a budget.

title: Qualcomm’s new Snapdragon is the chip we begged Intel to make
description:
Qualcomm’s upcoming Snapdragon X Elite PC platform is weird.

Twelve cores, all running at 3.8GHz. Normal, right? Not for an Arm chip like Qualcomm manufactures. We’ve all become used to performance cores and efficiency cores, and trying to minimize battery life by turning off cores when not in use.

It’s become such an accepted part of chip design that Intel followed Arm’s lead and designed its 12th-gen “Alder Lake” notebook chips with a mix of performance and efficiency cores. Gamers fumed; why was Intel mixing in low-power, slower efficiency cores when all they wanted was raw speed instead?

title: Short on time? Learn with Headway — only $49.97 for life through 10/31
description:
Social media can be a fun way to connect. However, Statista reports that the average person spends 151 minutes daily on social media. That’s 2.5 hours per day that we could use to learn and grow.
